spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent replication of the 2D footprint. Adjacency and wall alignment are near-perfect. Minor point deduction for slightly altered dimensions in labels compared to original text (e.g., Bedroom-1 changed from 16'5" to 13'6").

structural_fidelity.notes: Major violation of generation constraints. The second image is a 2D floor plan overlay on a gray background, not a 3D isometric render. It retains all text labels, measurement lines, and 2D symbols (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement and scale exactly match the reference plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The output fails all style requirements. It is not an isometric orthographic model (E3), it uses photorealistic textures from the 2D plan (E6), and is not a low-poly 3D representation.

detected_errors.description: Camera is top-down 2D, not isometric orthographic; model is not 3D.
Strict violation: Image contains text labels, room names, and measurement lines.
Style violation: Image uses 2D textures and marble patterns instead of flat colors/low-poly geometry.
